law.text: Decisions may be rendered in any boxing, kickboxing, mixed martial arts, or wrestling show or exhibition, permitted by this chapter, in the discretion of the authority and by such method as it by rule prescribes.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 91, sec. 12, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 21, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 19.
